description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Sequel to one of the top rated XBLIGs, Zombie Estate 2 is finally here! Includes  over 85 weapons, 30 characters, each with unique stats and starting weapons,  4 levels, 14 enemy types, and 30 unlockable hats that alter your character's stats! Play the new unlimited wave mode to see how long you can survive in Zombie Estate 2!
